com.googlecode.gwt.charts.client

Class ChartLoader

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.googlecode.gwt.charts.client.ChartLoader

  • public class ChartLoader
extends Object
    Utility class for loading the Chart Tools API using the Google Ajax Loader.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ChartLoader(ChartPackage... packages)
      Creates a chart loader with the specified packages.

    • Method Summary

      Returns the current language.

      Loads requested API libraries and calls an handler after finished.
      void setLanguage(String language)
      Sets the display language for the charts.
      void setPackages(ChartPackage... packages)
      Sets the packages for loading Must be set before loadApi(Runnable) is called.
      void setVersion(String version)
      Sets the api version for loading Must be set before loadApi(Runnable) is called.
